name: places/ChIJqyJ9NJdZwokRqGU33XwkKAc
formattedAddress: 10 W 15th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 10 W 15th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I was referred to Dr Haimovic by my family doctor and she was excellent. I thought I might have to do a biopsy and even though it’s considered a tiny procedure I still wanted to go to someone with surgery background because it was a spot on my face. My biopsy scar is still healing but I thought Dr Haimovic did a perfect job and she talked me through the entire process. Highly recommend her.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Haimovic for the past two years. She has been the most attentive and thorough Dermotologist that I have ever been to. She takes her time getting to know the patient, is always on time and follows up afterwards to make sure whatever treatment she gave worked. I've had a couple of issues that other doctors couldn't figure out what it was and she figured it out in a visit and treated it. Couldn't recommend her any more!

text.text: I have been seeing Dr. Haimovic for the past two years. She has been the most attentive and thorough Dermotologist that I have ever been to. She takes her time getting to know the patient, is always on time and follows up afterwards to make sure whatever treatment she gave worked. I've had a couple of issues that other doctors couldn't figure out what it was and she figured it out in a visit and treated it. Couldn't recommend her any more!

originalText.text:
She is hands down one of my favorite doctors ever - in any specialty.  I have gone to her several times when I've needed an abscess treated and while one would think that a pain-free and easy experience would be standard, trust me, at other doctors it has not always been the case - but with Dr. Haimovic it's a nervous person's dream come true.

Of course so many of us are biased towards our doctors and often say they are "the best", so here are my reasons, and without knowing me there's probably no reason to trust my perspectives - but I would Trust her to not just be really smart, but to tell me straight, not go down a route just because it was what she was good at if she thought someone else would be a better option, and I believe she has proven multiple times that she cares and is thorough - for example calling me from maternity leave to check on the healing progress of something I saw her for right before she went on leave, testing for something she knew wasn't common but her gut, my history, and some things she had observed had her feeling like it would be the smart thing to do - and she ended up ended up being right.  What I also can't stress enough is that she talks to me, explains what she is thinking, and explains why, etc.  Now maybe that's not for everyone and Maynw she tailors it depending on what the patient wants - but she knows I like to understand the logic and the details and she steps through it it's me and lets me challenge (nicely of course) or ask questions - just a tremendous bedside manner and nothing arrogant or any ego driven attitudes - which I find extremely rare.

She is a dermatologist that I would probably want to call if I needed to know a great cardiologist, that's how much she has earned the trust of someone who doesn't trust people based on titles or degrees, but on who they are, how they treat me, and how they think.

originalText.text: Dr. Haimovic’s attention to detail is impeccable. I went to Dr. Haimovic for a routine body scan and she found an abnormal mole on my thigh. I was visibly nervous from the experience and she did an incredible job at explaining what she thought it was and what the next steps should be. We decided to remove it on the spot and have it biopsied immediately. Days later the results came in and she was on vacation, but she took it upon herself to call me (from wherever she was) and deliver the results personally. It was a gesture I really appreciated and one that you don’t see that often. I have recommended Dr. Haimovic to many people and I will continue to see her for years to come.

originalText.text: Have had two appointments so far and Dr. Haimovic's attention to detail and personable manner is refreshing. She also takes her time, where in the past I've been rushed and it has affected me and how I behave at the doctor. Well - now I've realized that a great doctor is hard to find and I'm sticking around.
